body.name: HomeLifairy Stroller Fan Clip On for Baby Battery Operated Fan Portable Fan Rechargeable Mini Handheld Car Seat Fan Small USB Desk Personal Fan for Stroller Accessories Crib Car Rides (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 40 mins
features: Flexible Tripod: This personal portable fan with upgraded silicone flexible tripod design, which is made of high-quality metal and silicone cover. It is easy to clean and more durable. You can bent any angle you want, grip it, wrap it, stand it, keep it durable, flexible and stable.

Versatile and Portable: This baby stroller fan with flexible legs allow you to secure fan to baby stroller, crib, car seat, bed, bike, keep you and your baby cool. It also can be used as a desk fan or handheld fan.In addition, it is also suitable for camping, traveling, treadmill, car rides.

USB or Battery Powered: 2 in 1 powered style, support USB or Battery powered. 4.5~10 hours working time depends on speed.2600mAh rechargeable polymer battery is included.3.5 hours for full recharge. (Can also be charged by computer, laptop , power bank, car charger etc)
Powerful and Quiet: Upgraded fan blades, powerful and quiet. One-button operation for switching 3 wind speeds. It is suitable for your quiet office or reading, and your baby to sleep comfortably.
Cute Design: Cute tripod and beautiful design that you and your toddler will love - Ideal as a gift for your friends and family.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose HomeLifairy among the many Portable Fans? --We narrow the gap between the front cover and back cover of the fan. It is just 0.19 inch and smaller than others.This design can protect baby's tiny fingers from being accidentally caught. --Flexible tripod can bent any angle you want, handheld, wrap, stand and hang. Keep it durable, flexible and stable. It allows you to attach fan to baby stroller,car seat,crib,treadmill,bike, keep you and your baby cool. --One-button operation for switching 3 wind speeds.It is suitable for your quiet office or reading, and your baby to sleep comfortably. --360 ° rotation stroller fan head can adjust horizontally for any direction. --Folding and compact size, easy to carry it in your backpack. It's also the good choice for outdoor activities like travelling, riding bike, hiking, climbing, camping, exercising, go to the beach, picnic and walk etc.

Food-grade Silicone The updated tripod adopts new materials and manufacturing processes. It is soft, non slip, and comfortable to grip. It is waterproof and easy to clean, making it easy to use. Not easily broken and durable. Independent Power Button The independent power button design can prevent accidental touch and power loss. The upgraded circuit board provides current or voltage overload protection, extending the battery life. Baby's Protection The baby fans cover's gaps are less than 0.19in, it can prevent the baby's fingers or toes from getting into the fan to touch the blades.So it is safe for infants and children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Fan, Great Value, Might Require Some Common Sense For Long Life
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this fan, it moves plenty of air to keep a breeze going across my face and neck for hours at year sales. I was concerned about all the bad reviews and why people gave it such low mark and so I examined it closely and think I found the reason. The top of the legs are connected to the body in a way that allows movement in only 1 direction, the legs themselves can be moves in a 360 degree arc but if you grab the leg and pull it to the side putting pressure on the top of the leg it very well might break off, solution? Grab the top of the leg and hold it while you are adjusting it and you will never have a broken leg problem. Just looking at it will tell you that it can only move 1 direction. This is a fan in the $25 dollar range so it is not indestructible but it is a great value, it gives great performance for a rechargeable fan and with a little common sense it will last a long time. It gets 5 Stars from me but it does require a bit of common sense from the operator.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little fan has changed my life! I bought this for Disney and now I use it all the time. I had gotten this fan for the stroller and 4 little handheld fans. If I had the space I would have bought 4 of these. Very lightweight, easily attached, flexible legs, powerful fan and Bluetooth too! I set it up as a phone stand for the kids while they waited for food, cooled everyone off all day long and charged it end of day. We used it off and on daily not continuously. Now I use it in my girls room when it’s stuffy and set a timer if needed. It has speed controls too. It’s a great product 100% recommend to every parent or anyone needing a portable fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Took with us to Florida and we survived the heat clinging to our fan. The grip is ok, but it still twists on a round handle. There are 3 settings and the highest was best. It held a charge basically all day at highest setting. Durable when my kids dropped it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect fan for the summer for your babies! I used it for the car seat, stroller, doing my own make up, and even in the car for myself! I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quit working after 2 months of use
reviews.reviewText: This fan is very handy to have when it works. We started using it in June and it just broke after almost 2 months of use. I have fully charged it and it will no longer turn on. I noticed it would start glitching a week ago - we would turn it off and the blades would still spin. We had to manually stop the blades.Edit to add: The company has reached out and provided a replacement. The replacement seems to be working as expected, for now. It seems more powerful than the one we originally had too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You can put it anywhere

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: We live in CA and our summers are HOT! I ordered this fan a little over a year ago to attach to my sons stroller/back of headrest in car to keep him cool when we’re on the go. We put it away for the winter months and when I brought it back out it wouldn’t turn on unless it was plugged into the charger. Because we use it when we’re on the go, there was no way to keep it on the charger while using it so I emailed the company and they sent me a new one at no cost! Mind you, I was a a week or two past the year date of purchase so I was worried about it no longer being under warranty. The customer service was quick and to the point! Very happy with this company.When we received the new fan in the mail, I was happy to see that they made a few minor changes that overall make the fan even more powerful and user friendly. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for when I had my daughter. I usually propped it on the bed side table but you could also put it on the railing of the bed. Very powerful, I used on the lowest setting a few feet away and would actually get cold! Just wished it lasted longer between charges.

Easy to move about and attach the anything.3 speeds of fan for any environment!Great for some extra air in the car for baby or attach to the pram.The legs are quite firm and don’t bend too much so it can be loose depending on what you’re attaching it to.
